overview: MISTAKEN is a indie- action thriller set in the new jersey inner-city streets about two friends LaShawn and Jojo who are in the drug business but want to get out until LaShawn is shot and left for dead, have everyone think Jojo is to blame. Worrying about his family Jojo takes off out of state to live a different life, but after 5 years of being away he decides to come home to visit his mother for her birthday as a suprise only to be noticed, Now, he must do whatever it takes to uncover the truth.
tagline: Sometimes the past comes back to haunt you.
title: Mistaken
